name: PPI AG
goal: PPI AG is working as a consulting and software company for banks, insurances and financial service providers. In order to bring projects to a successful conclusion, PPI AG combines expert knowledge with technological proficiency. PPI AG follows the code of conduct of the International Chamber of Commerce for the economy.
interests: Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, Single market
euInitiatives: EU 2015/2366 (Payment Service Directive 2) and any other initiative, policy and legislative file concerning payments or retail financial services.
